segments.text: Observing this kitchen, I see the details unfolding slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink area, towel in hand over a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet is running full blast, basin full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets over the front, hitting the floor with a splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms around her shoes, but she remains focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the cabinet is ajar with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy balances on a stool, reaching high for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs spread unevenly, threatening to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate in one hand, jar in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a girl stands with arm up, palm open expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window reveals a neat garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack on the counter, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a snapshot of everyday life with hidden risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll turn around in time.
segments.speaker: PAR
